magnate.states

Class Collect

  • java.lang.Object
    • magnate.states.State
      • magnate.states.StateAdapter
        • magnate.states.Collect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Collect
extends StateAdapter
implements java.io.Serializable
    This state fills the local HashMaps with the cards on the game in the on_enter method. Then the method defined by the game, fills the ArrayLists with the options chosen by the players. This state is complete when the size of the arrays are equal.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Filipe
    See Also:
